mapper.sql: id, status, data_id, admin_judge_id, user_judge_id, created_at, updated_at,no_pass_reason,recheck_pass_reason,rechecked_at,checked_at
mapper.select:
SELECT di.data_name dataName, di.start_at startAt, di.end_at endAt, di.address address, c.con_name conName, di.data_unit dataUnit, di.created_at createdAt, dr.`status` status, di.upload_user_id uploadUserId, di.id, dr.no_pass_reason noPassReason, dr.recheck_pass_reason recheckPassReason, dr.admin_judge_id adminJudgeId, dr.user_judge_id userJudgeId, dr.rechecked_at recheckedAt, dr.checked_at checkedAt, u.name uploadName FROM t_data_review dr LEFT JOIN t_data_inf di ON dr.data_id = di.id LEFT JOIN t_contact c ON di.con_id = c.id left join t_user u on u.id=di.upload_user_id where di.deleted=0
and di.data_name like concat ('%',#{param.dataName},'%')
and di.created_at > str_to_date(#{param.start},'%Y-%m-%d')
and di.created_at < str_to_date(#{param.end},'%Y-%m-%d')
and dr.status =#{param.status}
select data_name dataName from t_data_inf where data_name like concat ('%',#{param.dataName},'%')

select id, status, data_id dataId, admin_judge_id adminJudgeId, user_judge_id userJudgeId, created_at createdAt, updated_at updatedAt, no_pass_reason noPassReason, recheck_pass_reason recheckPassReason, rechecked_at recheckedAt, checked_at checkedAt from t_data_review where data_id = #{param}
